info.name: Endless Rule 30 - 138 Characters
info.description:
Rule 30 cellular automaton in a tweet.
Can you reduce the character count?

renderpass.code:
//this shader is spooky. All the code is in common
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 p) { mi }
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
//this shader is spooky. All the code is in common
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 p) { mi }
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
//FabriceNeyret2 moved all the code here and reduced the character count heavily 138 chars
#define g(a) texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(a),0)//
#define mi                    \
  o = p.y > .5                            \
          ? g(p-o.xw)                     \
          : vec4(  iFrame==int(p) ||      \
                   g(p-o.wx) != sign(g(p)+g(p+o.wx) ));
              
/*Cylinder Version 143 chars
#define g(a) texture(iChannel0, (a)/iResolution.xy)//
#define mainImage(o,p)                    \
  o = p.y > .5                            \
          ? g(p-o.xw)                     \
          : vec4(  iFrame==int(p) ||      \
                   g(p-o.wx) != sign(g(p)+g(p+o.wx) ))
*/
renderpass.name: Common
